entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the twins mentioned in the text. He rolled his eyes at the ceiling.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is Ron's twin brother and is extremely interested in his bacon.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin mentioned in the text. He leaned in towards Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who has refused to buy a S.P.E.W. badge and is having a conversation with George.

relationships.description: Ron rolled his eyes at the ceiling.
Fred is extremely interested in his bacon.
George and Fred have met the people working in the kitchens.
